content: Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.
translations: ita:Gli amici possono aiutarsi a vicenda. Un vero amico è qualcuno che ti permette di avere la totale libertà di essere te s
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by ApAdAnA (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
